name: Rishikesh
description: Known as the 'Adventure Capital of India,' offering adrenaline-pumping activities amid the serene beauty of the Himalayas.

name: Manali
description: A hub for adventure sports, especially known for skiing in Solang Valley and Rohtang Pass.

name: Leh-Ladakh
description: Offers high-altitude adventure with breathtaking landscapes and the thrill of riding through the highest motorable roads.

name: Andaman and Nicobar Islands
description: Famous for crystal-clear waters and vibrant coral reefs, ideal for underwater adventures on Havelock Island.

name: Goa
description: Beyond its beaches and nightlife, Goa offers adrenaline-packed water sports along its scenic coastline.

name: Meghalaya
description: Explore mysterious caves like Mawsmai and trek to the unique Living Root Bridges in Cherrapunji.

name: Spiti Valley
description: Offers raw adventure in a stark desert landscape with ancient monasteries and challenging terrain.

name: Sikkim
description: Famous for the Goechala Trek and Dzongri Trek, offering rugged Himalayan beauty and adventure.

name: Coorg
description: Known as the 'Scotland of India,' Coorg is perfect for nature lovers and adventure seekers.
